death.attack.death_potion: %1$s thought it was a great idea to drink a potion with 'Death' in the name.
mmorpg.tooltip.item_modifiable_in_statio: Can be used inside Gear Modify Station
mmorpg.tooltip.player_levelup: If your experience bar is full, use this item to levelup!
mmorpg.tooltip.capacitor: Put Inside Repair Station to decrease fuel consumption.
mmorpg.tooltip.socketable_item: This Gem can be inserted into a Socket slot
mmorpg.tooltip.aoe_spell_explosion: Casts an elemental projectile that does AOE dmg on hit.
mmorpg.tooltip.single_target_spell_bolt: Casts a Single Target elemental projectile.
mmorpg.tooltip.aoe_bomb_spell: Leaves out a bomb that explodes later for Aoe Damage.
mmorpg.tooltip.ele_bonus_atk_dmg_spell: Gives buff, deal bonus dmg at cost of mana.
mmorpg.tooltip.put_in_mapdevice: Right Click on Map Device to Use
item.patchouli.age_of_exile_guide.name: Age of Exile Guidebook
mmorpg.word.alchemydesc: Combine the alchemist's mortar with ingredients to produce potions. Potions have strong but short effects.
mmorpg.word.armorcraftingdesc: Combine an Armorer's Cloth with a piece of armor and some materials to enchant that item with stats.
mmorpg.word.blacksmithdesc: Blacksmithing turns stones and minerals into useful tools.
mmorpg.word.cantusemoreof: Can't use more than 1 ingredient of that type.
mmorpg.word.cookingdesc: Combine the Cook's pot with ingredients to produce foods. Food has a long lasting effect.
mmorpg.word.corruptedexplanation1: Use Orb of Purification to clear corruption.
mmorpg.word.corruptedexplanation2: Item won't provide any stats until purified.
mmorpg.word.explorationdesc: Exploration is all about treasure finding! Looting chests out in the world gives not only loot and favor, but also exploration experience. Completing minecraft advancements also rewards experience.
mmorpg.word.failedbutsafe: Upgrade failed but the Protection Scroll effect safeguarded the item.
mmorpg.word.farmingdesc: Farming is the process of turning purified essence into edible crops. These crops can then be used for alchemy or cooking.
mmorpg.word.fishingdesc: Fishing is the simplest profession. You catch fish and get experience. Sometimes you might get important materials like ink, which is used in other professions. You can also catch different fish in different biomes.
mmorpg.word.gearhasdata: The used gear has stats already
mmorpg.word.holdtopreventpickup: Hold in your hand to prevent item pickup.
mmorpg.word.inscribingdesc: Combine the Scribe's Fabric with ingredients to produce scrolls. Scrolls buff everyone around you for a short duration.
mmorpg.word.jewelcraftingdesc: Combine a Jeweler's Tool with a ring or necklace and some materials to enchant that item with stats.
mmorpg.word.miningdesc: Mining is one of the basic gatherer professions. You gain experience for mining ores and smelting them. When mining ores, there's a small chance Mystical Stones pop up. They have various uses.
mmorpg.word.mustbespellgem: Must be a Spell Gem Item
mmorpg.word.nogear: This recipe requires gear as ingredient
mmorpg.word.passivedesc: Casted when hit by mob at low health.
mmorpg.word.repairkit2: Craft with fuel mat to charge.
mmorpg.word.rightclicktoidentifyfirst: Use to identify first item in inventory.
mmorpg.word.rightclicktoteleport: Use to teleport back from Adventure Map.
mmorpg.word.salvagingdesc: Salvaging is about turning useless gear into essence, a material that's useful for many things.
mmorpg.word.savesnamedorenchanted: Doesn't auto salvage named or enchanted items.
mmorpg.word.socketlvlisnthigherthaniteml: Socket lvl not higher than gear lvl
mmorpg.word.stormcloudspelldesc: Summons a storm cloud that deals damage over time.
mmorpg.word.useanidentifyscroll: An Identify Scroll can reveal it.
mmorpg.word.weaponcraftingdesc: Combine a Weapon Crafter's Hammer with a weapon and some materials to enchant that item with stats.
mmorpg.word.wrongingredient: You can't use use that item in this recipe.
mmorpg.word.wrongrecipeingredient: That ingredient isn't usable in this profession.

mmorpg.chat.can_not_go_over_maximum_leve: Can not go over maximum level
mmorpg.chat.dev_tools_enabled_contact_th: Devs tools enabled, if you see this please contact the author of Age of Exile [robertx22], he forgot to disable them!
mmorpg.chat.time_ran_out_due_to_permadea: Time ran out due to Permadeath
mmorpg.tips.favor: You gain favor when opening chests found in structures for the first time. Favor is expended when you gain loot. At zero favor, you can't obtain great loot and your experience gain is lowered!
mmorpg.tips.foodtoregen: You won't regenerate health or mana if your hunger bar is low.
mmorpg.tips.proffslvling: There are many professions and leveling them provide benefits, including bonus experience when killing mobs!
mmorpg.tips.proffwiki: Most professions have wiki sections, like what ores reward mining experience! Check it in the profession screen!
mmorpg.tips.wiki: There is an in-game wiki! It shows useful things like what unique gears exist, how to get them, what level mobs are in which dimensions and so on! Go check it out in the Main Hub! (Default key: H)
item.mmorpg.currency.number_reroll.desc: Re-rolls explicit numbers on a gear.
item.mmorpg.currency.orb_of_transmutatio: Transform common item into higher rarity.
item.mmorpg.currency.stone_of_hope.desc: Transform any rarity gear into higher rarity.
spell.desc.arrow_storm: Shoot out arrows in an arc, dealing
spell.desc.black_hole: Summon a dark sphere that attracts nearby enemies to it, dealing damage when it expires.
spell.desc.boulder_toss: Toss out multiple boulders, dealing heavy physical damage.
spell.desc.charged_bolt: Shoot a charged arrow that goes through enemies and deals dmg in radius and slows.
spell.desc.chill_eruption: Detonate every enemy affected by Chill to deal damage
spell.desc.chilling_field: Freeze area of sight, applying chill and damaging enemies  every second.
spell.desc.curse_of_agony: Curse enemies with Curse of Agony and deal dmg
spell.desc.curse_of_despair: Curse enemies with Curse of Despair and deal dmg
spell.desc.curse_of_weakness: Curse enemies with Curse of Weakness and deal dmg
spell.desc.damage_totem: Summon a totem which damages enemies around it.
spell.desc.dash: Dash in your direction and gain slowfall.
spell.desc.entangling_seed: Throw out a seed that explodes and petrifies enemies.
spell.desc.explosive_note: Summon an explosive note, dealing massive damage in the resulting explosion.
spell.desc.fire_trap: Throw out a trap that stays on the ground and activates when an enemy approaches to deal damage in area around itself.
spell.desc.frost_trap: Throw out a trap that stays on the ground and activates when an enemy approaches to deal damage in area around itself.
spell.desc.heal_totem: Summon a totem which restores  health to allies around it.
spell.desc.ice_snake: Summon an ice snake in your direction, slowing enemies.
spell.desc.jump_field: Summon a Jump Field, stepping on it will propel you upwards at high speeds.
spell.desc.levitation: Levitate in the air, but you can't move around besides upwards.
spell.desc.magic_projectile: Throw out a magical spark, dealing damage
spell.desc.magma_flower: Summon a magic flower that heals allies
spell.desc.mana_totem: Summon a totem which restores  mana to allies around it.
spell.desc.meteor: Summon a meteor that falls from the sky, dealing damage
spell.desc.meteor_strike: Strike enemies in front of you.
spell.desc.nocturne: Make enemies around you sleepy, decreasing their speed and attack damage.
spell.desc.poison_cloud: Erupt with poisonous gas, dealing damage to nearby enemies and spawning a poison cloud.
spell.desc.poison_trap: Throw out a trap that stays on the ground and activates when an enemy approaches to deal damage in area around itself.
spell.desc.power_chord: Imbue your staff with Word: Power.
spell.desc.pull: Pull enemies in area to you, dealing damage and slowing them.
spell.desc.purifying_touch: Heal allies around you and remove a negative effect
spell.desc.refresh: Refreshes all your spell cooldowns by 1 minute.
spell.desc.seeker_flames: Summon a ball of flame seeking the targeted enemy.
spell.desc.shooting_star: Shoots a star that heals allies
spell.desc.shred: Slash all nearby enemies, dealing  damage and reducing their defenses.
spell.desc.smoke_bomb: Throw out a smoke bomb, blinding enemies and reducing threat.
spell.desc.song_of_perseverance: Give a stack of Perseverance to all allies around you.
spell.desc.song_of_valor: Give a stack of Valor to all allies around you.
spell.desc.song_of_vigor: Give a stack of Vigor to all allies around you.
spell.desc.taunt: Shout, making enemies nearby want to attack you. Generates theat
spell.desc.teleport: Teleport yourself in the direction you're looking at.
spell.desc.test_spell: Shoot a charged arrow that goes through enemies and deals dmg in radius and slows.
spell.desc.tidal_wave: Strike enemies in front of you
spell.desc.venom_strike: Strike enemies in front of you and leave a poison trail.
mmorpg.stat.skill_xp: Increases xp gain of that profession/skill
mmorpg.stat_desc.all_all_damage: Increases All dmg of that element, both spells and attacks
mmorpg.stat_desc.all_attributes: Adds to DEX, INT STR, VIT, WIL, AGI.
mmorpg.stat_desc.all_dot_damage: Fire damage over time increases damage of burn, for example.

mmorpg.stat_desc.all_water_damage: Increases All dmg of that element, both spells and attacks
mmorpg.stat_desc.area_cdr: Reduces spell cooldown of spells with the tag.
mmorpg.stat_desc.area_dmg: Affects dmg done by area of effect abilities. Think meteor or other large aoe spells
mmorpg.stat_desc.armor: Decreases physical damage taken by a percent
mmorpg.stat_desc.arrow_cdr: Reduces spell cooldown of spells with the tag.
mmorpg.stat_desc.axe_damage: Increases damage done if it was caused by that weapon
mmorpg.stat_desc.blood: Blood is a unique resource that works like mana.
mmorpg.stat_desc.bow_damage: Increases damage done if it was caused by that weapon

mmorpg.stat_desc.dmg_to_living: Living entities are not undead ones.

mmorpg.stat_desc.inc_leech: Affects all resource leech stats like: onhit, leech dmg, on kill restore etc
mmorpg.stat_desc.increased_quantity: Increases amount of loot found in chests
mmorpg.stat_desc.intelligence: Determines your total: Spell Damage, Fire Resist, Ice Resist, Poison Resist
mmorpg.stat_desc.magic_dmg: Magic damage are mage spells, like fireball.
mmorpg.stat_desc.magic_dmg_received: Magic damage are mage spells, like fireball.
mmorpg.stat_desc.magic_find: Adds chance for higher rarity of items found in chests.
mmorpg.stat_desc.mana: Mana is used to cast spells

mmorpg.stat_desc.mana_regen: Restores this much every few seconds.
mmorpg.stat_desc.mana_shield: Percent of damage is absorbed by mana. This effect only works if mana is not less than 50 percent capacity. Mana shield is applied after magic shield.

mmorpg.stat_desc.spell_dodge: Chance to ignore magic spell damage. Melee and ranged type spells don't count.

mmorpg.stat_desc.spell_elemental_damage: Increases damage of spells of that element.
